metadata.title: CVE-2021-44269 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - negligible.
metadata.description: An out of bounds read was found in Wavpack 5.4.0 in processing *.WAV files. This issue triggered in function WavpackPackSamples of file src/pack_utils.c, tainted variable cnt is too large, that makes pointer sptr read beyond heap bound.

criterions.comment: wavpack package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
